Response Interpretation Toolset

Grimwire decides to handle a response according to its status code and "Content-Type" header. Use this to dictate the behavior of the client.


Status Codes

The currently supported behaviors, based on status code, include:

  • 204/304: no content - do nothing
  • 302/303: redirect - issue a GET request for html using the "Location" header of the response as the target URL
  • All others: render the response body to the target region

Content Type

The currently supported behaviors, based on the "Content-Type" header, include:

  • text/html: replace the innerHTML of the target region
  • application/html-deltas+json: apply the operations specified within the target region
  • all other types: stringify if an object, convert the < and > symbols to character codes, then replace the innerHTML of the target region
  • no value: create a popup alert of the response status and reason
